content: Hi I'm L. There are a lot of possibilities with this software that have caught my eye but I wanted to ask about one in particular. It's this interactive natural-language math exposition demo from Patrick Massot, which I found from Kevin Buzzard's talk; does anyone know if this is being built as a framework and if there is a GitHub for it / similar efforts?
There is not yet any public repository for it. But there will be one at some point. Kyle and I are currently very busy with other things but I hope we'll return to this soon.
@Patrick Massot note that right now I am telling people about the URL which you wrote in your IPAM talk (but qualifying that it might not always work).
I'll keep this page there until we have more to show.
@maintainers, could someone give access to mathlib to llllvvuu? They made #8925 from a fork (this is content coming from PFR).
